# unity-ui

一个小而美的 UI 组件库

[文档地址地址](https://easysimple.github.io/unity-ui/)

[ChangeLog](./CHANGELOG.md)

## Getting Started

Install dependencies,

```bash
$ npm i
```

Start the dev server,

```bash
$ npm start
```

Build documentation,

```bash
$ npm run docs:build
```

## git

```bash
$ git add .

$ npm run cz

$ git push

```
